meanings.sent1: The skookums tree stood tall and sturdy in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The new superhero movie had some skookums special effects.
meanings.sent3: The skookums car managed to carry all the heavy furniture without breaking down.
meanings.sent4: Her skookums determination helped her overcome all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The skookums mountain loomed majestically in the distance.

meanings.definition: A type of mythical creature in the folklore of the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that skookums roam the deep forests of the Pacific Northwest.
meanings.sent2: The children listened wide-eyed to stories of skookums told around the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous skookums played pranks on unsuspecting travelers in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The elusive skookums was said to have magical powers to protect the forest.
meanings.sent5: The villagers left offerings to appease the skookums and ensure good fortune.
